title: Wonder Woman
resume: Save the world? That’s a man’s job. Then along comes star-spangled WONDER WOMAN with her bullet-deflecting bracelets and golden lariat to set everyone straight. Former Miss USA Lynda Carter stars as DIANA PRINCE/WONDER WOMAN. Season 1 features adventures in Wonder Woman’s original World War II era. Seasons 2 and 3 whoosh forward to the Disco ’70s. Times change. The need to smash evil, calamity and injustice does not.
